### Category: Saturation
|Metric|Name in REST API|Unit|Aggregation|Dimensions|Time Grains|DS Export|
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
|**Disk Usage Percentage**<br><br>The utilization of the Managed Disk capacity in Azure Edge Zone Enterprise site. |`DiskStorageUsedSizeUsage` |Percent |Average |\<none\>|PT1H |Yes|
|**Total Disk Capacity**<br><br>The total capacity of Managed Disk in Azure Edge Zone Enterprise site. |`TotalDiskStorageSizeCapacity` |Bytes |Average |\<none\>|PT1H |Yes|
|**Total VCore Capacity**<br><br>The total capacity of the General-Purpose Compute vcore in Edge Zone Enterprise site. |`TotalVcoreCapacity` |Count |Average |\<none\>|PT1M |Yes|
|**Vcore Usage Percentage**<br><br>The utilization of the General-Purpose Compute vcores in Edge Zone Enterprise site |`VcoresUsage` |Percent |Average |\<none\>|PT1M |Yes|
